FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd security nonce command clears the Nonce value in SEND messages on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the Nonce value in SEND messages on a specified the name of interface.
-

Clears the Nonce value in SEND messages on a specified the type and number of interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd security nonce GigabitEthernet 1/0/1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset ipv6 nd security nonce command clears the Nonce values cached by the system when sending SEND messages. If further SEDN messages are received, the system will discard the messages because no matching Nonce values can be found in the cache. Exercise caution when running this command.
